not target.error: In order to use the MSVC compiler, the --target:<> must be set.

not windows.error: The MSVC compiler must be run on Windows.

not x64.error: The MSVC compiler must be run on an x64 machine.

description: The Microsoft Visual C++ Compiler (MSVC), linker, and other associated build tools. Combine with microsoft/cppruntime and microsoft/windowssdk for a complete development environment.
